content.text: The code repository located at /tmp/workdir/search_strands_20260128/jacocoxmlparser is currently written in Java 8. Please migrate the entire codebase to Java 17.

reasoningText.text:
The user wants me to migrate a Java 8 codebase to Java 17. I should:
1. First, explore the repository structure to understand what we're working with
2. Check the pom.xml file to see the current Java version and dependencies
3. Update the Java version to 17
4. Update dependencies to Java 17 compatible versions using the search_dependency_version tool
5. Check for any code that needs to be updated for Java 17 compatibility
6. Run `mvn clean verify` to ensure everything works

Let me start by exploring the repository structure.

Content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<project xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
         xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0"
         xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 http://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd">
    <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>

    <groupId>uk.co.alt236</groupId>
    <artifactId>jacocoxmlparser</artifactId>
    <version>1.0.0</version>

    <build>
        <plugins>
            <plugin>
                <artifactId>maven-compiler-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>3.2</version>
                <configuration>
                    <source>1.8</source>
                    <target>1.8</target>
                </configuration>
            </plugin>

            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.jacoco</groupId>
                <artifactId>jacoco-maven-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>0.8.3</version>

                <executions>
                    <execution>
                        <goals>
                            <goal>prepare-agent</goal>
                        </goals>
                    </execution>
                    <execution>
                        <id>generate-code-coverage-report</id>
                        <phase>test</phase>
                        <goals>
                            <goal>report</goal>
                        </goals>
                    </execution>
                </executions>
            </plugin>

            <plugin>
                <!-- Build an executable JAR -->
                <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                <artifactId>maven-shade-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>3.1.0</version>
                <executions>
                    <execution>
                        <phase>package</phase>
                        <goals>
                            <goal>shade</goal>
                        </goals>
                    </execution>
                </executions>

                <configuration>
                    <dependencyReducedPomLocation>${project.build.directory}/dependency-reduced-pom.xml
                    </dependencyReducedPomLocation>

                    <transformers>
                        <transformer
                                implementation="org.apache.maven.plugins.shade.resource.ManifestResourceTransformer">
                            <manifestEntries>
                                <Main-Class>uk.co.alt236.jacocoxmlparser.Main</Main-Class>
                            </manifestEntries>
                        </transformer>
                    </transformers>
                </configuration>
            </plugin>

            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                <artifactId>maven-jar-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>3.0.2</version>
                <configuration>
                    <archive>
                        <manifest>
                            <addDefaultImplementationEntries>true</addDefaultImplementationEntries>
                            <addDefaultSpecificationEntries>true</addDefaultSpecificationEntries>
                        </manifest>
                    </archive>
                </configuration>
            </plugin>
        </plugins>

        <pluginManagement>
            <plugins>
                <plugin>
                    <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                    <artifactId>maven-surefire-plugin</artifactId>
                    <version>3.0.0-M3</version>
                </plugin>
            </plugins>
        </pluginManagement>
    </build>

    <dependencies>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>commons-cli</groupId>
            <artifactId>commons-cli</artifactId>
            <version>1.4</version>
        </dependency>

        <dependency>
            <groupId>junit</groupId>
            <artifactId>junit</artifactId>
            <version>4.12</version>
            <scope>test</scope>
        </dependency>

        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.mockito</groupId>
            <artifactId>mockito-all</artifactId>
            <version>2.0.2-beta</version>
            <scope>test</scope>
        </dependency>

        <dependency>
            <groupId>com.google.code.findbugs</groupId>
            <artifactId>jsr305</artifactId>
            <version>3.0.2</version>
        </dependency>

        <dependency>
            <groupId>com.sun.xml.bind</groupId>
            <artifactId>jaxb-impl</artifactId>
            <version>2.3.2</version>
        </dependency>

        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.glassfish.jaxb</groupId>
            <artifactId>jaxb-core</artifactId>
            <version>2.3.0</version>
        </dependency>

        <dependency>
            <groupId>com.sun.activation</groupId>
            <artifactId>javax.activation</artifactId>
            <version>1.2.0</version>
        </dependency>

        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.apache.commons</groupId>
            <artifactId>commons-lang3</artifactId>
            <version>3.8.1</version>
        </dependency>

    </dependencies>
</project>

Content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<project xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
         xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0"
         xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 http://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd">
    <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>

    <groupId>uk.co.alt236</groupId>
    <artifactId>jacocoxmlparser</artifactId>
    <version>1.0.0</version>

    <build>
        <plugins>
            <plugin>
                <artifactId>maven-compiler-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>3.11.0</version>
                <configuration>
                    <source>17</source>
                    <target>17</target>
                    <release>17</release>
                </configuration>
            </plugin>

            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.jacoco</groupId>
                <artifactId>jacoco-maven-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>0.8.11</version>

                <executions>
                    <execution>
                        <goals>
                            <goal>prepare-agent</goal>
                        </goals>
                    </execution>
                    <execution>
                        <id>generate-code-coverage-report</id>
                        <phase>test</phase>
                        <goals>
                            <goal>report</goal>
                        </goals>
                    </execution>
                </executions>
            </plugin>

            <plugin>
                <!-- Build an executable JAR -->
                <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                <artifactId>maven-shade-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>3.5.1</version>
                <executions>
                    <execution>
                        <phase>package</phase>
                        <goals>
                            <goal>shade</goal>
                        </goals>
                    </execution>
                </executions>

                <configuration>
                    <dependencyReducedPomLocation>${project.build.directory}/dependency-reduced-pom.xml
                    </dependencyReducedPomLocation>

                    <transformers>
                        <transformer
                                implementation="org.apache.maven.plugins.shade.resource.ManifestResourceTransformer">
                            <manifestEntries>
                                <Main-Class>uk.co.alt236.jacocoxmlparser.Main</Main-Class>
                            </manifestEntries>
                        </transformer>
                    </transformers>
                </configuration>
            </plugin>

            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                <artifactId>maven-jar-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>3.3.0</version>
                <configuration>
                    <archive>
                        <manifest>
                            <addDefaultImplementationEntries>true</addDefaultImplementationEntries>
                            <addDefaultSpecificationEntries>true</addDefaultSpecificationEntries>
                        </manifest>
                    </archive>
                </configuration>
            </plugin>
        </plugins>

        <pluginManagement>
            <plugins>
                <plugin>
                    <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                    <artifactId>maven-surefire-plugin</artifactId>
                    <version>3.2.2</version>
                </plugin>
            </plugins>
        </pluginManagement>
    </build>

    <dependencies>
        <dependency>

            <version>1.9.0</version>
        </dependency>

        <dependency>

        <dependency>

input.file_text:
# Java 17 Migration Summary

## Overview
This document summarizes the migration of the jacocoxmlparser project from Java 8 to Java 17.

## Changes Made

### 1. Maven Compiler Plugin Configuration (pom.xml)
- **Updated maven-compiler-plugin version**: 3.2 → 3.11.0
- **Updated Java source**: 1.8 → 17
- **Updated Java target**: 1.8 → 17
- **Added release parameter**: 17 (ensures compatibility with Java 17)

### 2. Maven Plugin Updates (pom.xml)
- **jacoco-maven-plugin**: 0.8.3 → 0.8.11
- **maven-shade-plugin**: 3.1.0 → 3.5.1
- **maven-jar-plugin**: 3.0.2 → 3.3.0
- **maven-surefire-plugin**: 3.0.0-M3 → 3.2.2

### 3. Dependency Updates (pom.xml)

#### Production Dependencies
- **commons-cli**: 1.4 → 1.9.0
- **com.google.code.findbugs:jsr305**: 3.0.2 (unchanged, already compatible)
- **com.sun.xml.bind:jaxb-impl**: 2.3.2 → 4.0.5
- **org.glassfish.jaxb:jaxb-core**: 2.3.0 → 4.0.5
- **jakarta.xml.bind:jakarta.xml.bind-api**: (new) 4.0.2
- **org.apache.commons:commons-lang3**: 3.8.1 → 3.17.0
- **Removed**: com.sun.activation:javax.activation (no longer needed with Jakarta EE 9+)

#### Test Dependencies
- **junit:junit**: 4.12 → 4.13.2
- **org.mockito:mockito-all**: 2.0.2-beta → **org.mockito:mockito-core** 5.13.0

### 4. JAXB Namespace Migration
Migrated from Java EE (javax.*) to Jakarta EE (jakarta.*) namespaces in all source files:

#### Updated Files:
1. **Report.java**
   - `javax.xml.bind.annotation.*` → `jakarta.xml.bind.annotation.*`

2. **Package.java**
   - `javax.xml.bind.annotation.*` → `jakarta.xml.bind.annotation.*`

3. **Counter.java**
   - `javax.xml.bind.annotation.*` → `jakarta.xml.bind.annotation.*`

4. **Method.java**
   - `javax.xml.bind.annotation.*` → `jakarta.xml.bind.annotation.*`

5. **Clazz.java**
   - `javax.xml.bind.annotation.*` → `jakarta.xml.bind.annotation.*`

6. **ReportParser.java**
   - `javax.xml.bind.JAXBContext` → `jakarta.xml.bind.JAXBContext`
   - `javax.xml.bind.Unmarshaller` → `jakarta.xml.bind.Unmarshaller`

## Verification

### Build Success
✅ `mvn clean verify` completed successfully with Java 17

### Test Results
✅ All 9 tests passed:
- PackageReportCreatorTest: 1 test
- GlobalReportCreatorTest: 1 test
- CounterResultTest: 2 tests
- TableBuilderTest: 1 test
- ColumnMaxLengthTest: 3 tests
- ReportPrinterTest: 1 test

### Bytecode Verification
✅ Compiled classes use Java 17 bytecode (major version: 61)

### JAR Execution
✅ The shaded JAR runs successfully with Java 17

## Key Migration Points

1. **JAXB No Longer Included**: Java 11+ removed JAXB from the JDK, requiring explicit dependencies
2. **Jakarta EE Namespace**: Java EE was transferred to Eclipse Foundation and rebranded as Jakarta EE, changing the package namespace from `javax.*` to `jakarta.*`
3. **Mockito Artifact Change**: `mockito-all` is deprecated; use `mockito-core` instead
4. **Dependency Version Updates**: All dependencies updated to versions compatible with Java 17

## Benefits of Java 17

- Long-Term Support (LTS) release
- Performance improvements
- Enhanced security features
- Pattern matching for switch (preview)
- Sealed classes
- Records
- Text blocks
- Modern language features

## Compatibility

The migrated codebase is fully compatible with Java 17 and maintains backward compatibility for the application's functionality while leveraging the modern Jakarta EE standards.

# Java 17 Migration - Quick Reference Checklist

## ✅ Completed Tasks

### 1. POM.xml Updates
- [x] Updated maven-compiler-plugin to 3.11.0
- [x] Changed Java source/target from 1.8 to 17
- [x] Added release parameter set to 17
- [x] Updated jacoco-maven-plugin: 0.8.3 → 0.8.11
- [x] Updated maven-shade-plugin: 3.1.0 → 3.5.1
- [x] Updated maven-jar-plugin: 3.0.2 → 3.3.0
- [x] Updated maven-surefire-plugin: 3.0.0-M3 → 3.2.2

### 2. Dependency Updates
- [x] commons-cli: 1.4 → 1.9.0
- [x] junit: 4.12 → 4.13.2
- [x] mockito-all: 2.0.2-beta → mockito-core: 5.13.0
- [x] jaxb-impl: 2.3.2 → 4.0.5
- [x] jaxb-core: 2.3.0 → 4.0.5
- [x] Added jakarta.xml.bind-api: 4.0.2
- [x] commons-lang3: 3.8.1 → 3.17.0
- [x] Removed javax.activation (no longer needed)

### 3. Source Code Updates
- [x] Report.java: javax.xml.bind → jakarta.xml.bind
- [x] Package.java: javax.xml.bind → jakarta.xml.bind
- [x] Counter.java: javax.xml.bind → jakarta.xml.bind
- [x] Method.java: javax.xml.bind → jakarta.xml.bind
- [x] Clazz.java: javax.xml.bind → jakarta.xml.bind
- [x] ReportParser.java: javax.xml.bind → jakarta.xml.bind

### 4. Testing & Verification
- [x] mvn clean verify: BUILD SUCCESS
- [x] All 9 tests passing (0 failures, 0 errors)
- [x] Bytecode verification: major version 61 (Java 17)
- [x] JAR execution test: Working correctly
- [x] Application functionality test: Processing XML files successfully

## Summary Statistics

- **Files Modified**: 7 (1 pom.xml + 6 Java source files)
- **Dependencies Updated**: 8
- **Plugins Updated**: 4
- **Tests Passed**: 9/9 (100%)
- **Build Status**: ✅ SUCCESS

## Migration Impact

### Breaking Changes
- None (backward compatible at functionality level)

### New Requirements
- Java 17 runtime required
- Jakarta EE namespace used instead of Java EE

### Benefits Gained
- Long-term support (LTS)
- Modern language features available
- Improved performance
- Enhanced security
- Up-to-date dependencies

## Verification Commands

```bash
# Clean build
mvn clean verify

# Check Java version
mvn -v

# Verify bytecode version
javap -v target/classes/uk/co/alt236/jacocoxmlparser/Main.class | grep "major version"

# Test application
java -jar target/jacocoxmlparser-1.0.0.jar --input src/test/resources/test_jacoco.xml --global-stats
```

## Next Steps (Optional)

Consider exploring Java 17 features to enhance the codebase:
- [ ] Records for immutable data classes
- [ ] Text blocks for multiline strings
- [ ] Pattern matching for instanceof
- [ ] Switch expressions
- [ ] Sealed classes for restricted inheritance

- **Test Results**: ✅ 9/9 tests passed (0 failures, 0 errors)
- **Bytecode Version**: ✅ Major version 61 (Java 17)
- **JAR Execution**: ✅ Working perfectly
- **Functionality Test**: ✅ Application processes XML files correctly

### 🎯 Key Migration Points

1. **JAXB Migration**: The most significant change was migrating from Java EE's `javax.xml.bind` to Jakarta EE's `jakarta.xml.bind`, as JAXB was removed from the JDK in Java 11+.

2. **Mockito Update**: Changed from the deprecated `mockito-all` to `mockito-core`.

3. **All Dependencies Updated**: Every dependency was upgraded to a version that is fully compatible with Java 17.

4. **Build Tools Modernized**: All Maven plugins updated to versions that support Java 17.

### 📦 Project Statistics

- **Total Source Files**: 25 main + 7 test files = 32 Java files
- **Files Modified**: 7 (1 pom.xml + 6 Java source files with JAXB)
- **Tests**: All 9 tests passing
- **Build Time**: ~4 seconds

### 🚀 Ready to Use

The project is now fully migrated to Java 17 and passes `mvn clean verify` successfully. The application is production-ready and maintains full backward compatibility in terms of functionality while leveraging the modern Jakarta EE standards.

Two documentation files were created:
- `MIGRATION_SUMMARY.md` - Detailed migration documentation
- `MIGRATION_CHECKLIST.md` - Quick reference checklist
